verses.roman:
śuni' prabhura gaṇa prabhure kare anunaya
prabhu kahe,--"āmi bhikṣuka, āmā haite kichu naya

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; prabhura gaṇa—the devotees of the Lord; prabhure kare anunaya—entreated the Lord; prabhu kahe—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said; āmi bhikṣuka—I am a beggar; āmā haite kichu naya—it is not possible for Me to do anything.
translation: Hearing this news, all the devotees again appealed to the Lord, but the Lord replied,"I am a beggar. It is impossible for Me to do anything about this.
